feature_name: Hub beta build stamp sync to source commit 7edbe11
scope_summary: Rebuild and redeploy hub beta from clean source commit 7edbe11 so in-app build stamp and shipped artifact provenance match the latest source main.

legal_and_regulatory.rationale: Asset refresh only; no legal scope changes.
evidence: Only built bundle filenames and index references changed
No policy or user agreement text modified
No storage logic changed in website repo
No analytics or remote collection added

behavioral_science_alignment.rationale: Accurate provenance supports reliable behavior-layer iteration and debugging.
evidence: Build stamp in shipped JS now aligns with source commit 7edbe11

neurodivergence_research_alignment.rationale: Version trust reduces confusion when users validate behavior changes.
evidence: Live artifact traceability improved via stamp sync

user_benefit_and_harm_check.rationale: Users and maintainers can now verify exact deployed source commit without ambiguity.
evidence: Hub beta bundle rebuilt from commit 7edbe11
Index points to new stamped bundle
Only stamp value and bundle hash changed
No keyboard or layout behavior changes

security_and_reliability.rationale: Deploy integrity improved by stamp/source consistency.
evidence: Shipped bundle now carries latest source build stamp
Provenance checks can match source and deployed artifact

ship_decision.conditions: Ship and verify live /hub/beta bundle contains stamp 7edbe11.
